commit.message:
re PR fortran/45756 (Multiple DECL for array valued PARAMETER (-fwhole-file issue))

2010-09-28  Tobias Burnus  <burnus@net-b.de>

        PR fortran/45756
        * trans-decl.c (gfc_get_symbol_decl): Use gsym for decl of
        module parameters.

From-SVN: r164686

files.patch:
